subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalies no longer talk to their goalposts. Sanity has overtaken this generation of goalies who have grown up in a sport that figured out that a great goaltender was a requirement for a championship team.
snippet: Goalies no longer talk to their goalposts. Sanity has overtaken this generation of goalies who have grown up in a sport that figured out that a great goaltender was a requirement for a championship team.
